kissht - Data Engineer

Location - Mumbai, Work Type: Full time

It July 01, 2022

Job Description

Skillset Required

  • Experience of 3-5 years
  • Hands-on experience in setting up DataWare House and maintaining the same
  • Hands-on SQL experience on any of the databases, Postgres, SQL, MySQL, Aurora
  • Hands-on Python3 experience for scripting and coding
  • Expertise in creating DB schema, knowledge of RDMS, and Stored Procedures
  • Knowledge of any of the tools in Git-based version controlling
  • Sound knowledge of Data Structure and Algorithms
  • Very good and sharp problem-solving skills
  • Drive to work hard and newer technologies

Bonus

  • Knowledge of Snowflake
  • Knowledge of any BI tools like Tableau/ PowerBI/ Looker
  • Knowledge of AWS Service like Glue, S3, EC2.SNS, SQS
  • Any of API framework knowledge in Python like Flask, Tornado, FastAPI, Django

Job Expectations

  • Fluent in understanding current DB architecture
  • Hands on scripting python3 to create pipeline for moving data across data storages
  • Hands on with SQL Querying and DML transformations

Career Growth

  • Would be working on huge volumes of data
  • Building a data lake/data warehouse for TBs of Data across various Data Sources
  • Explore best of Data Engineering tools and way forward making a strong base for Data Engineering career

Direct Impact on Company

  • All development would contribute to take business decisions and Business Growth

Job Requirement

  • Knowledge of NoSQL DB like MongoDB is good to have
  • Good understanding of ETL, Data Lakes, and Datawarehouse as ecosystems and experience
  • Handling the continuous development and improvements of a data platform at a high scale
Apply
